effects.name: fadein
effects.description: Gradually increases the opacity of the video from 0% to 100% over the specified duration.

parameters.duration: Duration in seconds for the fade-in effect.

effects.name: fadeout
effects.description: Gradually decreases the opacity of the video from 100% to 0% over the specified duration.

parameters.duration: Duration in seconds for the fade-out effect.

effects.name: invert_colors
effects.description: Inverts the colors of the video, creating a negative effect.

effects.name: colorx
effects.description: Adjusts the color intensity of the video by multiplying the color values.

parameters.factor: Multiplier for color intensity. Values >1 increase color intensity, values <1 decrease it.

effects.name: lum_contrast
effects.description: Adjusts the luminance and contrast of the video.

effects.name: brightness
effects.description: Adjusts the brightness of the video.

parameters.factor: Multiplier for brightness. Values >1 increase brightness, values <1 decrease it.

effects.name: blackwhite
effects.description: Converts the video to black and white.

effects.name: rotate
effects.description: Rotates the video by a specified angle.

parameters.angle: Angle in degrees to rotate the video.

effects.name: resize
effects.description: Resizes the video to a specified width and height.

parameters.new_size: Tuple (width, height) specifying the new size of the video.

effects.name: scroll
effects.description: Scrolls the video in a specified direction.

effects.name: crop
effects.description: Crops the video to a specified rectangular area.

parameters.x1: Left boundary of the crop area.
parameters.x2: Right boundary of the crop area.
parameters.y1: Top boundary of the crop area.
parameters.y2: Bottom boundary of the crop area.

effects.name: mirror_x
effects.description: Mirrors the video horizontally.

effects.name: mirror_y
effects.description: Mirrors the video vertically.

effects.name: speedx
effects.description: Adjusts the speed of the video playback.

parameters.factor: Multiplier for speed. Values >1 speed up playback, values <1 slow it down.

effects.name: fadeinout
effects.description: Applies both fade-in and fade-out effects to the video.

parameters.duration: Duration in seconds for both fade-in and fade-out effects.

effects.name: clip_duration
effects.description: Sets the duration of the video clip to a specified length.

parameters.duration: New duration in seconds for the video clip.

effects.name: crop_center
effects.description: Crops the video to a specified center point and size.

effects.name: add_text
effects.description: Adds text overlay to the video at the center.

parameters.text: Text to overlay on the video.

effects.name: vignette
effects.description: Applies a vignette effect that darkens the edges of the video.

effects.name: color_filter
effects.description: Applies a color filter to the video.

effects.name: clip_speed
effects.description: Adjusts the playback speed of the video clip.

effects.name: resize_aspect_ratio
effects.description: Resizes the video while preserving the aspect ratio.

parameters.width: New width of the video. Height will be adjusted to preserve the aspect ratio.

effects.name: edge_detection
effects.description: Applies an edge detection filter to the video.

effects.name: zoom
effects.description: Applies a zoom effect to the video.

effects.name: saturation
effects.description: Adjusts the saturation of the video.

parameters.factor: Multiplier for saturation. Values >1 increase saturation, values <1 decrease it.
